transcript:
Customer: Shivay ko pramukh niyam walekum kahan hai?

Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. Sir, good morning. Alok baat kar raha hun sir IndiaMART se related.
Customer: Haan ji boliye sir.
Executive: Namaste sir. Main ye keh raha tha abhi amount wala ka to pata nahi chala kyunki complete service abhi aapki download nahi hui sir. Theek hai? Main maine apne end pe madam ke end pe ho gaya hai. Abhi ek layer jo rehti hai unke end pe woh process hona hai toh tab jaake ye service aapki complete download hogi sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Toh ye samajh lijiye ki do-teen din ka toh yani ki is week ka toh time lagega hi lagega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Is week chalega.
Executive: Dusri cheez, haan dusri cheez jo aap cashback puch rahe the sir woh cashback ke liye bhi maine discussion kiya hai. Toh unka ye kehna hai ki kyunki ye jo cashback hum logon ne generate kiya tha ye is deal ke according generate kiya tha jo aapne I mister ki deal ki thi sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Ab woh deal hi hum log bad debt kar rahe hain yani ki woh deal hi hum log cancel kar rahe hain toh woh is tarike se.
Customer: Suniye main ek baat suniye boliye.
Customer: Unhone ye kaha tha aapke is week 6 mahine mein kahin bhi use kar sakte ho. Aap niche utarte ho toh bhi use kar sakte ho usme milake aur aap ye MBC ko embassy le sakte ho aur TrustSeal mein bhi aap ja sakte ho.
Executive: Bilkul wohi bilkul correct baat hai jo unhone bilkul bole the na wohi correct baat hai ki jab aapka cashback jo deal aap karte hain uske against yani jo total amount paid karte hain uspe 10% ka cashback jo generate hota hai usko 6 mahine ki validity rehti hai. Woh 6 mahine ke tenure mein us cashback ko aap kisi bhi service ke liye aap usko utilize kar sakte hain sir. Theek hai? Woh bilkul correct baat hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: But reason kya hai ki yahan pe dikkat ye aa rahi hai ki woh jo deal hum logon ne ki thi usi deal ko hum log cancel kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Nahi sir deal cancel kare unhone ye bhi kaha tha ki aapko koi business ya aapko aisa lage ki bhai mere ko nahi lena hai toh aap woh cashback iske end kisi bhi pe leke aapka jo amount hai woh return le sakte ho.
Customer: Nahi maine toh unke baat ki hai ek ek ki.
Customer: Jaise kehne ka matlab unhone kaha ki aap MBC le lena. MBC leke aap woh uski kharidari ho gayi. Jaise MBC maine abhi 12-13 hazaar rupay deke MBC le li. Theek hai? Ab uska amount toh maine plus kar hi diya. Ab jo bhi mera payment bachega woh aap return lena woh rahega usme pura shok.
Executive: Sir main wohi toh wohi toh keh raha hun ki main usi ke liye maine nahi keh raha hun ki woh unhone jo bilkul condition boli thi woh bilkul correct boli thi.
Customer: Nahi condition ek cheez sir ab suniye meri baat zuban hai na boliye.
Executive: Sir, sir.
Customer: Paisa mere liye koi mayne nahi rakhta hai. Jo banda zuban pe nahi rehta hai na uska koi ilaaj nahi hai. Main toh short wali ye baat jaanta hun. Ab ye cheeze mere keh keh ke cheez dimag mein toh bhi aati hai ki bhai aisa ho jayega apne sath toh main likhwa ke lun. Ye cheez ye likhwa ke lun. Toh woh cheeze.
Executive: Nahi kehne ka matlab toh aapke paas sir gaya hai. Aisa nahi hai ki bhai woh cheez return mein tha aapke paas cashback toh wahan pe.
Customer: Nahi toh return mein tha toh woh toh already na sir woh toh phir ye bataiye ab suniye meri baat mere ko chalana hi nahi hai. Ab chalana nahi hai jab tak toh maine ye jod diya ki bhai mere ko cashback nahi milega. Theek hai? Ab mere ko cheez theek hai mere ko wahan start bhi nahi rehna hai mere ko niche aana hai. Toh woh mera cashback toh hai hi hai ki baat hai maine toh woh side li hai jabhi toh cashback de rahe ho na aap.
Executive: Sir main pata kya hai?
Customer: Bhai paise toh mere IndiaMART pe ho rahe hain na ye batao aap.
Executive: Suniye meri meri baat sir meri baat suniye aaj hum log us condition mein hai ki aaj aapne kisi ne aap se marble carving banwai. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kuch din usne rakhi apne ghar mein ki haan bhai chalo aapne se payment vement bhi ho gaya sara kuch ho gaya ek dedh mahine baad bhai mujhe pasand nahi aa rahi aap isko wapas toh mere paise wapas kar do. Theek hai? Toh aap us condition mein kya karoge? Ek tarike se aap apne upar loss loge na? Ab aapke paas kya option hai ki bhai ya toh koi adjustment karoge ya kuch karoge. But sir hum log bhi ye samajh rahe hain ki aap aapki condition aap aap ek baat bataiye koi service ko live karne ke liye kitna process hota hai woh sare costing jati hai. But uske baad aapne toh ek bar bol diya ki bhai nahi mujhe toh usme convert kar do tum jo kar rahe hain. Ab usme wohi bani suniye meri baat jo bhi cost lagi hai woh toh aap apna nikalo main ye nahi bol raha hun. Jo bhi yahi hai woh direct cheez hai toh woh le lo aapki main ye nahi bol raha hun aap aisa mat lijiye waisa mat lijiye. Jo cheez lagi hai woh aap lo. Abhi jaise maine pehle bol diya tha domain wagera toh maine pehle hi bol diya tha ki sir aapka domain wagera liya hua hai aap paise kaat lo. Koi dikkat nahi hai. Kyunki woh company mera domain ka kya karegi? Jaise abhi ye website meri banegi TrustSeal pe. Ab main ispe nahi rahunga toh mera domain toh woh company kya karegi use ka? Kuch bhi koi matlab hi nahi hai main hi nahi hun customer hi nahi hun. Ab solution suniye meri baat jo cheez aapke lagat aa rahi hai aapko pata hai maine is customer pe 10 hazaar rupay kharch kiye toh woh 10 hazaar nikaaliye na kya dikkat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Sir main abhi main keh raha hun ki maine abhi na Sonal mam se jaake baat kiya uske cashback ke liye kyunki finance walon ne toh mana kar diya tha but phir bhi maine unse request kiya unhone mail dal diya unko theek hai account wali team ko toh hopefully shayad jo hai woh wahan pe aapke adjustment ho jaye is wali deal mein nayi wali deal mein theek hai? But ek bar main tab tak aapko nahi haan bol sakta ki jab tak ek bar wahan ki side se approval na aa jaye. But aapke behalf pe maine Sonal mam se already mail dalwa diya unko finance ki team ko unhone bhi bola ki koshish karke dekhte hain ki shayad aa jaye wahan pe cashback ka aapka adjustment.
Customer: Woh toh aayega na sir woh toh unhone bola hai ki woh aisa nahi hai sir hum logon ko bhi aapka pata hai aapko bolne ki zarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Woh toh mere ko pata hai aap logon se mere ko baat karke bahut achcha lag raha hai woh nahi hai ki main TrustSeal pe jaunga toh aapko main chhod dunga aisa nahi hoga ye dhyan rakhna aap.
Customer: Theek hai hum log bhi apni side se jo aapke expectation hai koshish kare ki bhai kahin na kahin mil jaye theek hai? But ye par sara sara aa jaye mere paas bhi details toh tabhi main aapko bilkul sari cheezon ke liye haan bol sakta hun.
Executive: Koi nahi aap aaram se bata dena koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Maine dal par aane do ek bar approval toh uske baad jaise approval aa jayega toh main bata dunga ki bhai haan sir ye aapka cashback adjustment ho jayega maximize iske andar.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji. Clear hai sir aapko theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur time de dijiye is week ke isi week ke andar hi kaam karwa ke deta hun aapka ye sara.
Customer: Ji ji theek hai ji okay.
Executive: Theek hai aur detail aane ke baad jaise aa jayega na mere paas amount ka ki bhai itna amount hai tab phir main maximize karke jab performa approve karaunga tab aapko sari cheeze price wagera sari cheeze calculation karke tab aapko dikha ke tabhi.
Customer: Nahi sir woh cashback ka toh nahi hai nahi toh phir woh ticket katega phir koi dikkat hogi.
Executive: Aap nishchint raho sir us cheez ke liye aapki koi bhi cheez aisa hidden mein nahi hai sab kuch aapko bata ke sari cheeze kara ke tabhi karaenge usko bilkul sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji nishchint raho.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay theek theek okay bahut bahut dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants cashback adjustment.

- Customer says executive promised cashback earlier.



Resolution:

- Executive contacted finance team for cashback adjustment.

- Executive assured customer of resolution this week.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer after approval.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- cashback, adjustment, refund, domain, trustseal
